Package com.amplifyframework.datastore

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataStoreCategoryBehavior
    A DataStore is a high-level abstraction of an object repository.
    DataStoreConfigurationProvider
    Implementations of this interface should provide access to a DataStoreConfiguration that represents the configuration used across all DataStore underlying components.
    DataStoreConflictHandler
    A hook to handle a conflict between local and remote copies of a model.
    DataStoreErrorHandler
    Just a ~type-alias for a consumer of DataStoreException.
    DataStoreSyncExpression
    Used to specify a QueryPredicate for a Model that will filter what is synced to the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmplifyDisposables
    A utility for building Rx Disposables from Amplify entities, e.g.
    AWSDataStorePlugin
    An AWS implementation of the DataStorePlugin.
    DataStoreCategory
    DataStore simplifies local storage of your application data on the device for offline access and automatically synchronizes data with the cloud.The category is implemented by zero or more DataStorePlugin.
    DataStoreCategoryConfiguration
    Configurations for all plugins of the DataStore category.
    DataStoreConfiguration
    Configuration options for AWSDataStorePlugin.
    DataStoreConfiguration.Builder
    Builds instances of AWSDataStorePlugin by providing a variety of configuration methods.
    DataStoreConflictHandler.AlwaysApplyRemoteHandler
    A handler which always elects to apply the remote version of the data.
    DataStoreConflictHandler.AlwaysRetryLocalHandler
    A handler which always elects to re-send the local data in a new mutation.
    DataStoreConflictHandler.ConflictData<T extends Model>
    Represents a conflict between two models that has occurred during model synchronization.
    DataStoreConflictHandler.ConflictResolutionDecision<T extends Model>
    The possible decisions for a conflict resolution.
    DataStoreItemChange<T extends Model>
    A DataStoreItemChange is emitted whenever there is a change to an item in the DataStore.
    DataStoreItemChange.Builder<T extends Model>
    A utility to construct instances of DataStoreItemChange.
    DataStorePlugin<E>
    A plugin which implements the required behavior of the DataStoreCategory.
    DefaultDataStoreErrorHandler
    A default implementation of the DataStoreErrorHandler which just logs the error and moves on.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataStoreChannelEventName
    An enumeration of the names of events relating the DataStoreCategory, that are published via HubCategory.publish(HubChannel, HubEvent) on the HubChannel.DATASTORE channel.
    DataStoreConflictHandler.ResolutionStrategy
    An enumeration of the various strategies available for dealing with a model conflict.
    DataStoreItemChange.Initiator
    The initiator of the change.
    DataStoreItemChange.Type
    A DataStoreItemChange can either be caused by a call to one of the DataStoreCategoryBehavior.save(Model, Consumer, Consumer) family of methods, or to one of the DataStoreCategoryBehavior.delete(Model, Consumer, Consumer) methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataStoreException
    Exception thrown by DataStore category plugins.
    DataStoreException.GraphQLResponseException
    Exception thrown by DataStore category plugins used to represent a GraphQLResponse containing errors.
